entities.description: The year when the person first smoked part or all of a cigarette.
The month when the person first smoked part or all of a cigarette.
The time since the person last smoked part or all of a cigarette.
Number of days the person smoked part or all of a cigarette in the past 30 days.
Indicator that the person has never used cigarettes.
Indicator that the person refused to answer the question.

relationships.description: Indicates the year the respondent first smoked a cigarette.
Indicates the month the respondent first smoked a cigarette.
Indicates the time since the respondent last smoked a cigarette.
Indicates the number of days the respondent smoked in the past 30 days.
Indicates that the respondent has never used cigarettes.
Indicates that the respondent refused to answer the question.
